Interface com.chimu.form.transaction.TransactionCoordinator

public interface TransactionCoordinator
A TransactionCoordinator coordinates doing multiple operations within a begin-commit-rollback transaction environment for JDBC

Method Index

connection()
dontAutoPrepareConnectionState()
Turn off the feature of the transaction coordinator automatically preparing the state of the connection before using.
dontAutoRestoreConnectionState()
Turn off the feature of the transaction coordinator remembering and restoring the previous state of the connection.
execute()
Execute the transaction's procedure which will either succeed or throw a TransactionException.
executeProcedure(Procedure0Arg)
Execute the provided procedure which will either succeed or throw a TransactionException.
prepareConnectionState()
Explicitly prepare the connection state
release()
Release the TransactionCoordinator from duty: clear the connection and preprare for finalization.
setupSingleProcedure(Procedure0Arg)
Give the TransactionCoordinator a single procedure to use for "execute".
setupTransactionIsolationLevel(int)
Set the isolation level to be used for the transaction.
value()

Methods

setupTransactionIsolationLevel 
 public abstract boolean setupTransactionIsolationLevel(int isolationLevel)
Set the isolation level to be used for the transaction. If the level is not known to be supported, the method returns false. The IsolationLevel should be one of:
  • TRANSACTION_READ_UNCOMMITTED
  • TRANSACTION_READ_COMMITTED
  • TRANSACTION_REPEATABLE_READ
  • TRANSACTION_SERIALIZABLE

See Also:
Connection
setupSingleProcedure 
 public abstract void setupSingleProcedure(Procedure0Arg procedure)
Give the TransactionCoordinator a single procedure to use for "execute".

In the future this will be augmented by multiple "Commands" that each are attempted with the transaction.

dontAutoRestoreConnectionState 
 public abstract void dontAutoRestoreConnectionState()
Turn off the feature of the transaction coordinator remembering and restoring the previous state of the connection.

dontAutoPrepareConnectionState 
 public abstract void dontAutoPrepareConnectionState()
Turn off the feature of the transaction coordinator automatically preparing the state of the connection before using.

release
